right click Asset -> update
Check the Commit log:
- press 'Action' tab to sort for easier view.
- Updated: fine
- Added: nothing to do
- Conflict: resolve using 'their' if it is not your change, 'mine' if it is your change (if choose 'mine' have to inform Jay & Nam)
- Versioned: right click & revert

Commit process:
- right click to the asset inside Unity
- show in explorer
- select that file + meta file
- tortoiseSVN / add (delete)
